CaféJoja.Description: Joja Cola with coffee. Popular with cold-brew drinkers.
DoctorJo.Description: A pepper-style soda made by Joja. Somehow, Joja got this brand its own medical license to legally keep its name.
JojaBerri.Description: Joja Cola, now with real, 'Berri' flavour!
JojaBluu.Description: Joja's most recent flavour, but its hard to pinpoint what that actual flavour is.
JojaColaAMPED.Description: An energy drink by Joja. It's basically Joja Cola with guarana extract.
JojaNil.Description: Joja's diet cola. No sugar, but loads of artificial sweeteners.
JojaPine.Description: A cola with hints of a pineapple-like flavour.
JojAid.Description: JojAid is a sports energy drink containing plenty of electolytes, vitamins, and sugar.
Kyūrei.Description: A melon soda made in the Gotoro Empire by Joja. Presumably smuggled to the Ferngill Republic through the embargo.
NewJoja.Description: A perfectly sealed can from decades ago. The cola itself is clear, and the taste an urban legend.
OranJoja.Description: An orange-flavoured soda, made by Joja. Popular with those who like fruity flavours.
Pixi.Description: A lemonade made by Joja. It's so sweet, you can barely taste the lemon.
VineyardeSparkling.Description: Rumors say this is the failed Joja Grape flavour, rebranded to be a 'classy' cola. Tastes disappointingly foul.
config.FishingTrashPool.name: Add sodas as fishable trash
config.GarbageCanPool.name: Add sodas as possible garbage can items
